name: Pyromaniac 3 -- 2
description:
15 years after the critically acclaimed fire-fighter fighting simulator, Pyromaniac 3, there is finally a sequel: Pyromaniac 3 -- 2.

Grow your fire throughout each level, wreaking havoc on volunteer firemen.

Made with Unity3D in 48 hours for LD34.

Controls:

A & D or left arrow & right arrow --> move left/move right

space --> jump

mouse1 --> shoot

Link to the Ludum Dare submission: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=60146
